   6-31 bytes - free"}},"getAssetsProportions()":{"returns":{"proportions":"Proportions of assets with 18 decimals. Only vault can call this."},"description()":{"notice":"How strategy earns money"},"doHardWork()":{"notice":"Execute HardWork During HardWork strategy claiming revenue and processing it. Only vault can call this."},"emergencyStopInvesting()":{"notice":"Emergency stop investing by strategy, withdraw liquidity without rewards. This action triggers FUSE mode. If both example conditions are met then total number or variations = total farms * total widths."},"platform()":{"notice":"Stability Platform main contract sion":1}

ammAdapter().details: AMM adapter address for interacting with pool

ammAdapterId().details: AMM adapter string ID for interacting with pool

returns.value: Liquidity value or underlying token amount

params.amount: Amount of underlying asset to invest

returns._0: 0-2 bytes - strategy color         3-5 bytes - strategy background color         6-31 bytes - free

returns.proportions: Proportions of assets with 18 decimals. Min is 0, max is 1e18.

returns.amounts: Amounts. Index of asset same as in previous array.

returns.name: Empty string or specific name
returns.showInVaultSymbol: Show specific in linked vault symbol

params.platform_: Need this param because method called when strategy implementation is not initialized

returns.addresses: Init strategy addresses. Indexes for each variants depends of copmpared arrays lengths.
returns.nums: Init strategy numbers. Indexes for each variants depends of copmpared arrays lengths.
returns.ticks: Init strategy ticks. Indexes for each variants depends of copmpared arrays lengths.
returns.variants: Descriptions of the strategy for making money

initialize(address[],uint256[],int24[]).details: A single universal initializer for all strategy implementations.

params.addresses: All addresses that strategy requires for initialization. Min array length is 2.        addresses[0]: platform (required)        addresses[1]: vault (required)        addresses[2]: initStrategyAddresses[0] (optional)        addresses[3]: initStrategyAddresses[1] (optional)        addresses[n]: initStrategyAddresses[n - 2] (optional)
params.nums: All uint values that strategy requires for initialization. Min array length is 0.
params.ticks: All int24 values that strategy requires for initialization. Min array length is 0.

lastApr().details: Last APR of earned USD amount registered by HardWork      ONLY FOR OFF-CHAIN USE.      Not trusted asset price can be manipulated.

lastAprCompound().details: Last APR of compounded assets registered by HardWork.      Can be used on-chain.

params.amountsMax: Amounts of specified assets available for investing
params.assets_: Strategy assets or part of them, if necessary

returns.amountsConsumed: Cosumed amounts of assets when investing
returns.value: Liquidity value or underlying token amount minted when investing

supportedVaultTypes().details: Types of vault that supported by strategy implementation

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[EIP section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

total().details: Balance of liquidity token or liquidity value

transferAssets(uint256,uint256,address).details: For specified amount of shares, transfer strategy assets from contract balance and send to receiver if possible This method is called by vault w/o underlying on triggered fuse mode. Only vault can call this.

params.amount: Ampunt of liquidity value that user withdraw
params.receiver: User of vault which withdraw assets

returns.amountsOut: Amounts of strategy assets sent to user

underlying().details: Can be used for liquidity farming strategies where AMM has fungible liquidity token (Solidly forks, etc),      for concentrated liquidity tokenized vaults (Gamma, G-UNI etc) and for other needs.

returns._0: Address of underlying token or zero address if no underlying in strategy

withdrawAssets(address[],uint256,address.details: For specified amount of shares and assets_, withdraw strategy assets from farm/pool/staking and send to receiver if possible Only vault can call this.

params.assets_: Here we give the user a choice of assets to withdraw if strategy support it
params.value: Part of strategy total value to withdraw

returns.amountsOut: Amounts of assets sent to user

params.amount: Ampunt of underlying asset to withdraw
params.receiver: User of vault which withdraw underlying from the vault

assetsAmounts().notice: Final assets and amounts that strategy manages

createdBlock().notice: Block number when contract was initialized

depositAssets(uint256[]).notice: Invest strategy assets. Amounts of assets must be already on strategy contract balance. Only vault can call this.

depositUnderlying(uint256).notice: Invest underlying asset. Asset must be already on strategy contract balance. Only vault can call this.

doHardWork().notice: Execute HardWork During HardWork strategy claiming revenue and processing it. Only vault can call this.

emergencyStopInvesting().notice: Emergency stop investing by strategy, withdraw liquidity without rewards. This action triggers FUSE mode. Only governance or multisig can call this.

getRevenue().notice: All strategy revenue (pool fees, farm rewards etc) that not claimed by strategy yet

getSpecificName().notice: Optional specific name of investing strategy, underyling type, setup variation etc

initVariants(address).notice: Variants pf strategy initializations with description of money making mechanic. As example, if strategy need farm, then number of variations is number of available farms. If CAMM strategy have set of available widths (tick ranges), then number of variations is number of available farms. If both example conditions are met then total number or variations = total farms * total widths.

previewDepositAssets(address[],uint256[].notice: Calculation of consumed amounts and liquidity/underlying value for provided strategy assets and amounts.

withdrawUnderlying(uint256,address).notice: Wothdraw underlying invested and send to receiver Only vault can call this.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function () pure returns (struct ILPStrategy.LPStrategyBaseStorage storage pointer)
function (struct ILPStrategy.LPStrategyBaseStorage storage pointer,address,struct ILPStrategy.LPStrategyBaseInitParams memory,string memory) returns (address[] memory,uint256)
function () pure returns (struct ILPStrategy.LPStrategyBaseStorage storage pointer)
function () pure returns (struct ILPStrategy.LPStrategyBaseStorage storage pointer)
function () pure returns (struct ILPStrategy.LPStrategyBaseStorage storage pointer)
function (address,uint256[] memory) view external returns (uint256,uint256[] memory)
function () pure returns (struct ILPStrategy.LPStrategyBaseStorage storage pointer)
function () pure returns (struct IStrategy.StrategyBaseStorage storage pointer)
function () pure returns (struct ILPStrategy.LPStrategyBaseStorage storage pointer)
